collection.title: Work from home relaxation tools
collection.body_html: Elevate your sleep experience with work from home relaxation tools. Premium products that bring luxury sleep wellness into your daily self-care routine.

products.title: Aethera White Noise Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker for Sleep & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Aethera White Noise Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker for Sleep & Relaxation

Transform your sleep and relaxation routine with the Aethera White Noise Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker. This innovative device combines bone conduction technology with soothing white noise, Bluetooth connectivity, and smart card timing functions. Designed to ease insomnia, reduce stress, and create a calming environment, it’s perfect for bedrooms, workspaces, or travel.

Available in stylish colors (black, white, sky blue, pink), this slim and portable design offers immersive sound and advanced relaxation features, making it a must-have sleep and wellness companion.

How to Use:

  1. Charge the speaker fully using the included cable before first use.

  2. Press the power button to switch on the device.

  3. Pair with your smartphone or device via Bluetooth.

  4. Choose between white noise modes, music playback, or relaxation sounds.

  5. Adjust timing and volume for a personalized sleep or focus experience.

Specifications:

  • Product: Aethera White Noise Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker

  • Power Type: Lithium battery (rechargeable)

  • Battery Capacity: 500mAh

  • Rated Voltage: 5V

  • Frequency Range: 60Hz – 15KHz

  • Product Size: 131.8 x 51.7 x 9.5 mm

  • Color Options: Black, White, Sky Blue, Pink

  • Specifications: Full set of standards

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Combines white noise & music with Bluetooth functionality
✔ Bone conduction technology for immersive sound
✔ Helps with insomnia relief, stress reduction & relaxation
✔ Slim, portable & stylish – available in 4 colors
✔ Long-lasting rechargeable 500mAh battery

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Aethera White Noise Bone Conduction Bluetooth Speaker

Product Image:

products.title: Amoraxn Oversized Double-Sided Silk Sleep Mask Luxurious Eye Mask for Sleeping & Rest
products.body_html:
Amoraxn Oversized Double-Sided Silk Sleep Mask Luxurious Eye Mask for Sleeping & Rest

Indulge in uninterrupted, restful sleep with the Amoraxn Oversized Double-Sided Silk Sleep Mask. Made from premium silk on both sides, this oversized eye mask fully blocks light while providing a soft, breathable, and gentle feel. Perfect for women, travel, or at-home relaxation.

How to Use:

  1. Place the mask over your eyes, ensuring full coverage.

  2. Adjust the strap for a comfortable, ergonomic fit.

  3. Use during sleep, travel, naps, or meditation for complete darkness.

  4. Clean gently with a damp cloth or hand wash with mild detergent.

Specifications:

  • Material: Double-sided premium silk

  • Type: Oversized Sleep Mask

  • Strap: Adjustable for most head sizes

  • Features: Full light blocking, soft & breathable, ergonomic fit, portable & lightweight

  • Usage: Home, travel, naps, or meditation

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Luxurious double-sided silk feels gentle on skin

  • Oversized design provides total light blocking for deep sleep

  • Adjustable strap fits most head sizes comfortably

  • Lightweight and portable, perfect for travel or home use

  • Promotes relaxation and reduces light disturbance

Package Contents:

  • 1 x Amoraxn Oversized Double-Sided Silk Sleep Mask

Experience deeper, more restful sleep with the Athreaz Intelligent Hand Grip Sleeping Aid Instrument. Designed to soothe nerves and reduce stress, this compact device combines EMS pulse therapy, white noise, and music functions to promote relaxation and improve sleep quality.

Its rechargeable design makes it convenient for home or travel use. Whether you’re struggling with insomnia, tension, or just need a calming moment before bed, this hand grip instrument is your ideal sleep companion.

Key Features:

  • EMS pulse therapy for relaxation and nerve soothing

  • Built-in white noise and music functions for better sleep

  • Rechargeable for convenient use anywhere

  • Compact and portable design

  • Timing function for automatic operation

  • Helps relieve stress and improve sleep quality

Specifications:

  • Functions: Timing, Music, White Noise, EMS Pulse

  • Material: High-quality ABS & ergonomic grip design

Why You’ll Love It:

products.title: Ignistal White Noise Aroma Diffuser Desktop Humidifier with Flame Sleep & Relaxation
products.body_html:
Ignistal White Noise Aroma Diffuser Desktop Humidifier with Flame Sleep & Relaxation

Create a relaxing and soothing environment with the Ignistal White Noise Flame Aroma Diffuser, designed to combine humidification, aromatherapy, white noise, and ambient flame lighting. Perfect for bedrooms, offices, or commercial spaces, this diffuser promotes better sleep, reduces stress, and enhances overall well-being.

The device features mechanical and remote control dual operation, allowing easy adjustment of fog, light, and white noise functions. With a quiet operation of 36–45dB and adjustable timing from 2–8 hours, it offers customizable comfort for any space. The 0.5L reservoir ensures long-lasting aroma diffusion, while multiple color and style options fit any décor.

Key Features:

  • White Noise & Sleep Aid: Promotes restful sleep and relaxation.

  • Humidification & Aromatherapy: Diffuses essential oils and adds moisture to the air.

  • Flame Light Effect: Creates a cozy and calming ambiance.

  • Dual Operation: Mechanical and remote control for easy use.

  • Quiet & Adjustable: Noise 36–45dB, timer 2–8 hours for worry-free operation.

  • Versatile Use: Suitable for home, office, industrial, and commercial environments.

Specifications:

  • Power Type: Plug-in

  • Noise Level: 36–45dB

  • Applicable Scenarios: Household, industrial, commercial

  • Color / Model Options:

    • V28 White – basic style

    • V28 Black – basic style

    • V28 Light wood grain – basic style

    • V28 White – Bluetooth white noise

    • V28 Black – Bluetooth white noise

    • V28 Light wood grain – Bluetooth white noise

  • Shape: Round

  • Operation Mode: Mechanical + Remote Control

  • Functions: Humidification, aromatherapy, timing, sleep aid, atomizer, ultrasound, mute, lighting, diffusion

  • Fog Export Quantity: 2

  • Reservoir Capacity: ≤0.5L

  • Size: 150 × 150 × 105 mm

Why You’ll Love It:

✔ Combines humidification, aromatherapy, and white noise in one device
✔ Adjustable flame lighting for calming ambiance
✔ Timer and dual control for convenience and safety
✔ Quiet operation suitable for sleep, work, or study
✔ Stylish and versatile for home, office, or commercial use

Package Contents:

  • 1 × Ignistal Aroma Diffuser

  • 1 × Essential Oil

products.title: Ilisya Chamomile  Steam Warm Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes & Sleep
products.body_html:
Ilisya Chamomile  Steam Warm Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes & Sleep

Drift into deep, restful sleep and say goodbye to tired, puffy eyes with the Ilisya Steam Warm Eye Mask. This innovative self-heating mask is infused with a natural chamomile scent to provide a spa-like experience from the comfort of your home. It gently warms to soothe your delicate eye area, helping to relieve tension and reduce the appearance of dark circles and puffiness. Whether you've been staring at a screen all day or are just getting ready for bed, this mask is your go-to solution for everyday eye care and relaxation.

How to Use

Using the Ilisya Steam Warm Eye Mask is simple and convenient.

  1. Remove the mask from its individual packet.

  2. Tear along the perforations to open the ear loops.

  3. Hook the ear loops over your ears with the white side of the mask facing your eyes.

  4. The mask will begin to warm up on its own.

  5. Relax and enjoy the gentle steam for 20-30 minutes.

Specifications

  • Type: Steam Warm Eye Mask

  • Scent: Chamomile-infused

  • Quantity: 10 individually wrapped masks per box

  • Material: Soft, non-woven fabric

  • Heating Time: Up to 30 minutes

    Why You'll Love It:

  • Relieves eye strain

  • Reduces dark circles 

  • Soothes puffy eyes
  • Moisturizes the under-eye area 
  • Promotes relaxation.

Package Contents

  • 1 x Box of Ilisya Steam Warm Eye Masks (10 masks total)

Product Image:

products.title: Orbited 3D Silk Travel Eye Mask Comfortable Light Blocking for Office Naps & Restful Sleep
products.body_html:
Orbited 3D Silk Travel Eye Mask Comfortable Light Blocking for Office Naps & Restful Sleep

Achieve restful and undisturbed sleep anywhere with the Orbited 3D Travel Silk Eye Mask. Designed with soft, breathable silk and a contoured 3D shape, this mask blocks out light while providing maximum comfort at home, office, or during travel.

How to Use:

  1. Place the eye mask over your eyes with the 3D contoured side facing your eyes.

products.body_html:
Visiozx Bluetooth Heated Eye Massager Vibrating Airbag Kneading Therapy for Relaxation & Sleep

Relax and relieve eye strain with the Visiozx Bluetooth Heated Eye Massager. Combining vibration, hot compress, and airbag kneading, this device promotes better sleep, reduces fatigue, and soothes tired eyes. With Bluetooth connectivity, enjoy your favorite music while receiving a professional-style eye massage at home, office, or while traveling.

Key Features:

  • Bluetooth connectivity to play music or guided relaxation audio

  • Vibration massage + heated compress for soothing relief

  • Airbag kneading gently stimulates eye muscles to reduce fatigue

  • Adjustable temperature & intensity for personalized comfort

  • Foldable & portable design for travel, office, or home use

  • Rechargeable battery for cordless convenience

Specifications:

  • Type: Heated Eye Massager

  • Brand: Visiozx

  • Functions: Vibration massage, hot compress, airbag kneading

  • Material: Soft, skin-friendly fabric

  • Power: Rechargeable battery

  • Use Case: Home, office, travel, relaxation

Why You'll Love It:

  • Reduces eye strain, puffiness, and dryness

  • Promotes relaxation and better sleep quality

  • Bluetooth for music or meditation audio during massage

  • Foldable and portable design for convenience

  • Adjustable settings for heat, intensity, and massage mode

  • Suitable for students, professionals, and travelers

  • Ideal gift for friends or family who value wellness

  • 1 x USB Charging Cable

products.title: Wangsonole Removable Memory Foam Eye Mask Blackout for Sleep & Relaxation Aid
products.body_html:
Wangsonole Removable Memory Foam Eye Mask Blackout for Sleep & Relaxation Aid

Experience ultimate comfort and complete darkness with the Wangsonole Memory Foam Eye Mask. Designed with soft, removable memory foam, this unisex sleep mask contours to your eyes, providing gentle pressure relief, light shading, and blackout for improved rest.

Perfect for sleep at home, travel, or meditation, it’s lightweight, durable, and easy to use for anyone seeking better sleep and relaxation.

How to Use:

  1. Adjust or remove the memory foam insert as needed for comfort.

  2. Place the mask over your eyes and secure the strap for a snug fit.

  3. Relax and enjoy total darkness for sleep, travel, or meditation.

Specifications:

  • Material: Polyester

  • Type: Cross-border Removable Memory Foam Eye Mask

  • Colors: Light Gray, Medium Gray

  • Fit: Unisex, adjustable

  • Function: Blackout & Sleep Aid

  • Style: Simple & Personalised

Why You’ll Love It:

  • Contoured memory foam for gentle eye comfort

  • Provides complete blackout for restful sleep

  • Lightweight and portable for travel or meditation

  • Removable inserts allow adjustable comfort

  • Ideal for sleep, travel, meditation, or relaxation

products.title: Wiieey Steam Sleep Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes & Dark Circles Relaxation & Travel Use
products.body_html:
Wiieey Sleep Steam Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes, Dark Circles & Relaxation

Soothe tired eyes and drift into relaxation with the Wiieey Steam Sleep Eye Mask. Made with non-woven fabric, cotton, and tourmaline, this self-heating eye mask gently warms up to relieve eye strain, reduce puffiness, and refresh your under-eye area.

Perfect for bedtime, travel, or screen fatigue relief, the mask offers a spa-like steam therapy experience anytime you need comfort and calm.

How to Use:

  1. Remove the eye mask from the packet.

  2. Place the mask over your eyes with ear loops secured behind your ears.

  3. The mask naturally warms up to provide soothing steam.

  4. Relax for 20–30 minutes while enjoying deep comfort.

Specifications:

  • Ingredients: Non-woven fabric, cotton, tourmaline

  • Material: Non-woven fabric

  • Size: 11.3 × 4.5 × 14.3 cm

  • Heating Time: Up to 30 minutes

  • Quantity: 5 individually packed masks

Why You’ll Love It:
✔ Reduces eye puffiness & dark circles
✔ Relieves eye strain & screen fatigue
✔ Promotes restful sleep & relaxation
✔ Lightweight, breathable material
✔ Travel-friendly & easy to use

Package Contents:
1 × Pack of Wiieey Steam Sleep Eye Masks (5 pieces)
